website_summaries.verdict: Sold as a three pack, this effective acne cleanser comes at a significant value.
pros: Works well with a facial cleansing brush, but can also be used on its own
Does a good job of keeping oil at bay
Contains 2% salicylic acid for added breakout fighting power
Helpful in clearing up cystic acne, which is tough to combat
cons: Isn’t meant as a method of removing makeup

customer_reviews.title: not woking so far
customer_reviews.text: dries my skin. no acne have disappeared but a lot have shown up. ima hang in there tho and see.
customer_reviews.author: mom1985

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Caused my skin to dry out and begin to peel badly.
customer_reviews.author: Precilla E.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Breakouts
customer_reviews.text: This made me break out SO badly every time I used it. Now I use it to wash my feet because I don't want to waste my money. You get what you pay for, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: luckydb16

customer_reviews.title: broke me out even more
customer_reviews.text: I used this face wash twice a day and it broke my skin out even more, my face is extremely dry and it burns. I haven't used any other products so I know it's this one
customer_reviews.author: Myonna

customer_reviews.title: Red rash over entire face!
customer_reviews.text: I broke out after 2 days of using this! My face is covered with little itchy red bumps now. Will not buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie D

customer_reviews.title: Pimple Stopper!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for many years. I’ve always had a problem with acne, and I find, no matter how much I take care of my face, if I neglect to use this product, for a number of days, I get breakouts. (I kid you not) I have read several reviews on here, that says that the face wash is drying on the face, this is true, however, it is imperative that you moisturize after. I would suggest also, for those of you who have breakouts/acne issues on their back, or other parts of their body, to try this product as a body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Devi

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice any improvements on my face. Then I looked at the label in the back and discovered that this doesn't help with pre-existing acne. It only somewhat prevents them. Regardless of that, I'm giving it 2 stars because it doesn't make for a very good face wash (for me, at least). Using this product 1 to 2 times a day would leave my skin irritated and dry and would sometimes peel layers off of my skin, especially around my eyes. And the product, seemingly, didn't do anything to prevent more acne from surfacing. A lot of people are writing positive reviews so maybe it works for them, but I didn't get that experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lakshya

customer_reviews.title: Works a little too well
customer_reviews.text: Love Neutrogena products and have recently experienced more acne, so I thought I’d give this wash a try. Well it definitely dries out your face. I have combination skin and sometimes I experience this with masks but never this intensely with a face wash. My skin was tight and dry almost instantly. Definitely works so I’m going to save this product for my more intense breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: arv1509

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm when paired with Facial Cleansing Brush! (Or alone)
customer_reviews.text: I bought a facial cleanser brush to pair with this, and the combo is unbeatable! Use this every day or every other day if your skin dries out easily. Here is the link to the best value facial cleansing brush in my opinion: Use these two products, and watch as your acne dissipates! I'm so happy with my skin now thanks to these products!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: It's been awhile since I used Neutrogena products. I'm glad I did , same quality. For people saying it will dry you up .it's the salicylic acid , its the active ingredient (for acne). So use a moisturiser after cleansing, if you have sensitive skin use the one with out the acid. The scent isn't strong ,leaves my skin clear and soft. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face wash
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite face wash. I've been using it for nearly 20 years. I have sensitive skin and rosacea with acne. This helps keep the acne under control. Yes, this can dry your skin out but you should moisturize after using it. I've actually found this to be one of the less drying face washes for acne.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Cleans dirty pores
customer_reviews.text: Seems like I got more product buying from Amazon vs the grocery store at the same price. I have a greasy face and this product dried my skin out until I used to it. After about a month of use it did help my completion.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Beale

customer_reviews.title: Can be stripping to the skin
customer_reviews.text: Although it is formulated with 2% salicylic acid ( the strongest over the counter %) and salicylic acid is one of the most gentle exfoliants; the other cleansing agents can strip the skin and can be unstable - which means risk if sensitivity and irritation is very high. There are MUCH better alternatives to this product. The Cerve Renewing SA (salicylic acid Cleanser and Versed Keep The Peace Ance-Calming Cream Cleanser (formulated with 1.5% salicylic acid) - I find - are much better alternatives. I hope this helps :)
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash for blackheads
customer_reviews.text: I read that this facewash is good for treating blackheads, and that's definitely true. It's strong, so I don't use it every time I wash my face, but it has definitely helped. I have sensitive skin and this doesn't bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my skin :(
customer_reviews.text: It’s really my fault. After the second wash I noticed that the lower half of my face started to itch terribly and it also developed tiny red and white bumps but I thought “well it’s working maybe?” The next day, third wash, no matter how much I moisturized, the lower half of my face began to peel and was extremely dry. I stopped using It then. It’s been a week and my face is still peeling and extremely dry and itchy ALL THE TIME no matter how much I moisturize. It has an overall rough texture to it now. I didn’t even have acne I just wanted it to help out with the occasional pimples.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I think moisturizing is funny rated category on here because this dries your face out like Palm Springs in the sun for 12 hours with no water or chap-stick. But it leaves your face feeling like nothing was ever on it. It doesn't have much of a smell which I appreciate and it cleans literally everything off your face. You are going to need a good moisturizer after using this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Geckos to the Max

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for a few months now. I bought one a while ago and it lasted my pretty long and I loved it. So I bought the 3 pack. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is it is very drying!!! I have oily skin so it is perfect for me and exactly what I was looking for. I highly highly recommend it just make sure to moisturize well after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Jarred rush

customer_reviews.title: Possibly fake product
customer_reviews.text: I used this cleanser for years and bought some for the first time off Amazon. I immediately thought something is wrong. The cleanser doesn't have the original scent. I honestly feel like this is fake. I'm going to be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: jenabee

customer_reviews.title: Works well; competitively priced
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with acne my entire adult life. I find usage of facial acne wash containing salicylic acid works best to help control my acne. Up to now I have used generic brands, but I find this Neutrogena brand is priced competitively, works as well, has a mild scent, and leaves my face feeling less dried out. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry R. Nye

customer_reviews.title: Having doubts
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been using this wash for years and we decided to buy the 3-pack. Unfortunately after a few weeks of use my wife has noticed this is not as effective as usual. I went to my local store to buy one to compare and from the smell to the consistency the product is different, plus the store bought wash does work as it is supposed to. This is definitely not the same product you buy in the store. Too bad you can't buy online with confidence anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Pier Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: BE VERY CAREFUL
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Neutrogena oil-free Acne Wash for years, that's the only face Wash that works for me! So I know the original very well, that's why when I received this I knew right away it was a FAKE, It came open and looks completely different from the original. I quickly return WHATEVER they call it, because it sure wasn't my Neutrogena oil-free Acne Wash I knew. So there may be a reason why it didn't or is not working for you, because it might be a FAKE! SO BE VERY CAREFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Diggs

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: My husband started using this product years ago and won't go without it. He keeps the bottle in his shower rack and swears by it. No complexion problems any more!
customer_reviews.author: CAG - NC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for acne
customer_reviews.text: I have always had acne issue and acne scaring. Tried alot of face wash but it didn't make my skin any better. Finally I decided to try this face wash and now my acne has reduced by almost 70% and still improving every day. Finally found the right face wash
customer_reviews.author: Ranveeeer singghh

customer_reviews.title: Best for prevention
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years. I only use it nightly as a preventative medication. It takes off all the makeup. Makes the skin little dry but i always moisturize at night anyway. Will continue to use as it helps prevent and clear up anything that comes up
customer_reviews.author: zeeshan

customer_reviews.title: Moisturize after
customer_reviews.text: Part of my daily routine. It helprd me deal with oily skin and breakouts were significantly reduced. Moisturizing after is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This continues to be the soap for sensitive skin users who have oily skin. It cleans well and does does not leave any irritation even when used along with a washcloth. Just make sure to keep it out of your eyes as that acid ingredient burns like he$$.
customer_reviews.author: Bongo

customer_reviews.title: Best for acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years, and it is the best cleanser for acne-prone skin; however, if you have sensitive skin, I do not recommend it. It is on the strong side and clears up my skin fast. I highly recommend for normal to oily skin types.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great value price
customer_reviews.text: I have used Neutrogena face wash for many years. This definitely was the best purchase for the money. I received a three pack of full-size Neutrogena face wash for $18. When purchasing in the store you can pay up to $10 per bottle. Definitely excellent value for a product I already love.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product description
customer_reviews.text: Deceptive product description. This price is for 3 not one! Which is not visible on the front page because the title is so long. And amazon doesn’t take returns of this item, I’m stuck with many more than I need.
customer_reviews.author: Zaphod B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for oily skin! I used this and I have more dry skin and I got chemical burns. I would not recommend anyone to follow the instructions of twice per day to start.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This works amazingly. I use it in the shower everyday after I wash my hair, and it really helps get all the oils and everything off your skin and get rid of acne. Definitely need to use a moisturizer after you dry off though or your face with tighten up. Definitely recommend it for it's intended purpose though.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob3poore

customer_reviews.title: This works really well if you use a makeup remover ...
customer_reviews.text: This works really well if you use a makeup remover wipe first. Otherwise it doesn't get all of your makeup off.
customer_reviews.author: MissD

customer_reviews.title: Dry dry dry for days after use
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Neutrogena Ultra Gentle and was fairly happy but wanted to try something to target my acne more. Was happy at first but after day 3 the areas around my nose and corners of my lips started drying out painfully a cracking, have been using the same fantastic moisturizer for months but it couldn't help. I have stopped using this cleanser for a week now and only moisturizing and my face is still horrible dry and flakey. Do not try this!
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Weigand

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else will suffice
customer_reviews.text: Really just fallen in love with this stuff as my life long face wash. Love the pump, cleans off easy, doesn’t irritate or dry out my sensitive skin. And believe me, my skin is super sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Suffering adult acne is not fun , I alway try new products. It’s a good facial cleanser . It did not cause dryness. Just make sure you keep your skin hydrated
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: My sisters favorite
customer_reviews.text: I personally dislike this cleanser because I have a sensitivity to fragrance, but my sister loves this cleanser it it really is a much better value than the pharmacy price. My recommendation for a fragrance free salicylic acid wash is Zap Zyt.
customer_reviews.author: Jack c.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: After using this face wash for just 2-3 days (once a day) the skin around my chin got rashes, and my lips went swollen and super dry. Don't waste your money on this product. It does more harm than help.
customer_reviews.author: Sahar

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: Skin is noticeably smoother and cleaner immediately after applying. Definitely prevents acne from even forming. No side effects like redness or dry skin. Will use this for the rest of my life
customer_reviews.author: Michalk

customer_reviews.title: Watch out
customer_reviews.text: this is some heavy duty stuff. Will dry the heck out of your skin. You will def need some moisturizer with this.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Teen age girls acne.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter is having a little trouble with acne at this time we are trying different products to see if they will work.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Malcom

customer_reviews.title: Great for shaving
customer_reviews.text: I use these for shaving - saves me a lot of money over using shave gel, and it’s a lot better on my skin. However, the last 25% is very watery for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: JustMyTake

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Still my go to cleanser for make-up removal and keeping acne away. Over 10 years now, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: scam listing
customer_reviews.text: Product stated it would come with 3 bottles of soap but only came with 1. What a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great for acne. Always check with your dermatologist if you can before using different products.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: 3rd day using this and I absolutely love the effect its already having on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Good soap for acne.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it advertises. Not a moisturizing soap. It’s for acne treatment.

customer_reviews.title: Great price on subscribe and save for this great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great price on subscribe and save for this great product. A gentle facial product that I have been using forever due to its great quality.

customer_reviews.title: good product, does as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not a magic cure for acne but certainly works as needed over time... not too drying which helps
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kondratowicz

customer_reviews.title: It’s Neutrogena
customer_reviews.text: It’s Neutrogena. Its what my husband has used for years. Good stuff. Delivered timely and well packaged. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CVQVC

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I use it because I have dry acne prone skin- I weakens it a but by adding water. Overall works great when added with a exfoliating face wash :)
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Always loved Neutrogena face wash
customer_reviews.text: Always loved Neutrogena face wash. Not really anything else on the market that has cleaned my face for so many years. This is basically like getting one free when you buy this pack.
customer_reviews.author: Moify

customer_reviews.title: Still my favorite face wash
customer_reviews.text: Neutrogena changed formulas on their lotions so I can't use them anymore, but this face wash still does the job. The anti irritant quality is great.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. good value with 3 pack.. helps clear up skin
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gatica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have been using for years. It does its work.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Always been my go-to
customer_reviews.text: This face wash has helped me through rough skin times. My acne is much under control, and I've never felt anything negative on my skin from using this wash. It's an 'absolute recommend' on this one.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Good face wash
customer_reviews.text: This is Greate for skin and gives good feeling after washing the face. It does not makes skin too dry.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash! Not drying on the skin! 🧴
customer_reviews.text: I like this facial scrub! I believe this came 3 in a pack. We keep them in the shower to use on our faces while we shower. Not harsh or drying on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: The only face wash I will use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this face wash for years and it work well with my sensitive skin, and keeps me from breaking out. I even use it on my shoulders in the shower after working out. Strong but gentle, a good purchase for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen D.

customer_reviews.title: Not a medicine for acne
customer_reviews.text: This works great at cleansing and I felt refreshed after using it. But didn't work as a treatment medicine for my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Fay W

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for years and love it. It works great for my very sensitive skin..
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: My all time go to 10 years and going strong product!
customer_reviews.author: Paulina saldivar

customer_reviews.title: I have cystic acne on my chin and cheeks which is painful and tender to touch
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how I lived without this face wash! The 2% Salicylic acid ingredient is just right to prevent my breakouts. I have cystic acne on my chin and cheeks which is painful and tender to touch, this wash keeps it at bay. My skin makeup is combination but mostly drier skin around my chin and cheeks with a more oily forehead. I don't follow the directions exactly, I apply this to my face when its dry before I shower, massage for 30 seconds and then keep it on until I can't handle the sting anymore. I think this is best for me because it cleans deep before I wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: very good product to buy just the wrapping should be harder to protect it from squeezing and to all customers who faced problem with their skin it is really important to know what type of skin you have

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite face wash. I have really sensitive skin and this is the only wash I can use without breaking out. I would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Irritating and causes acne
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the amount of 5 star reviews. This product made my acne worse and left my face irritated after every use. I switch to this soap from a different nutragena product so I was expecting similar results. I was disappointed. Stay away from this soap

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin problems
customer_reviews.text: I couple this product with an acne cream to control it. Wish I’d know that when I was younger!

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product is so much cheaper than buying it in the store. I've bought it a couple times now and its been great.

customer_reviews.text: Breaks my husbands skin out terribly with huge acne bumps that take weeks to heal.
customer_reviews.author: M. Legg

customer_reviews.title: Good for oily/combination skin
customer_reviews.text: I have always had acne and tried many different products and brands to treat it. This face wash has worked best for me since it gently unclogs my pores and gets my skin cleaner without being overly drying or irritating. I use it in the morning and at night. Plus, this three in one package is a great deal. This can get really expensive at a department store. I would recommend it for oily skin and mild acne or breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Mommy IL

customer_reviews.title: If you have any sensitivity to anything you prob should not buy this
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this to be and since I found it on Amazon cheaper I ordered it on here. Started using it the day I got it. The first day I had no problem, until I woke up the next morning and my face felt like it was on fire and my skin was pealing off my face. It has been three days since I stopped using it and my skin is still not back to normal I patches of dray irritated (bright red) areas all over my face. It is kinda sad because I had high hopes for this products and now looking at other review, others have had the same people have had the same problem.

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Fighting Facial Cleanser with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Medicine, Daily Oil-Free Acne Face Wash for Acne-Prone Skin, 9.1 fl. oz, 3 pk
product_meta.description: Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash is the #1 dermatologist recommended acne-fighting facial cleanser. This daily acne face wash contains salicylic acid and is formulated to gently clean deep into pores for clearer skin and even helps treat acne before it emerges. Clinically proven Micro-Clear technology helps boost the delivery of acne medication to help clear up acne and blackheads, and even helps prevent future breakouts. The acne-fighting formula oil-free formula rinses clean without over-drying or irritating the skin. From the #1 dermatologist-recommended acne brand, Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash is suitable for daily use as part of a regular acne skin care routine.
feature_bullets: Value pack containing three 9.1-fluid ounce pump bottles of Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Face Wash with salicylic acid acne medication to help fight acne and prevent breakouts while cleansing skin

The #1 dermatologist recommended acne-fighting face cleanser, its unique formula gently cleanses deep down into pores with conditioners while the salicylic acid acne medicine helps prevent future breakouts in one simple step
Clinically proven Micro Clear technology helps boost delivery of salicylic acid, an acne medicine to help clear up acne, pimples and blackheads

The residue- and oil-free formula is non-comedogenic so it won't clog pores. This daily acne face wash also rinses clean without over drying or irritating the skin to help unclog pores and treat acne even before it emerges

Use this acne fighting face wash from the #1 dermatologist-recommended brand as part of a daily skincare routine for clearer-looking skin. Consider this product if you've liked cleansers from Proactiv, Clearasil, Biore, Mountain Falls & Cetaphil
